cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.IT 

Reasoning: The paper presents a Bayesian model for decision-making under time pressure with endogenous information acquisition, which involves sampling a continuous-time stochastic process. This topic is relevant to several sub-fields in computer science, including artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), control systems (cs.SY), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and information theory (cs.IT).
